base_description: Rectangular cabinet, medium size, gray, modern style.
part_description: Consists of two main sections: a vertical shelf on the left and a large sliding door on the right with handles.
internal_interaction_description: The sliding door moves horizontally along a track to reveal or conceal the internal storage space. The vertical shelf is fixed and provides additional storage, dividing the cabinet into two functional areas.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be mounted on a wall and interacts with users by providing storage space. The sliding door allows easy access to contents, and the handles facilitate smooth opening and closing.
